alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 12:31AM AKST until November 08 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Along the Bering Strait Coast very strong winds and heavy snow with near blizzard conditions will move into the area tonight and will continue into Monday morning. Blizzard conditions will improve Monday afternoon as snow mixes with and then changes to freezing rain Monday afternoon and then changes to rain Monday night. On St Lawerence Island expect mainly rain. Expect very strong wind gusts to 55 mph to develop late tonight and to continue into Monday night for St Lawerence Island and the Bering Strait Coast.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
